title: Bernie Karshmer Program Fund
description: To support a program, symposium, speaker, film series or event related to ethics and humanities in memory of Bernard A. Karshmer, PhD.  If $25,000 gifts are received within 5 years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: To support a program, symposium, speaker, film series or event related to ethics and humanities in memory of Bernard A. Karshmer, PhD. If $25,000 gifts are received within 5 years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
